text: Dr Leow is one of the most exceptional doctors. His bedside manner is unbelievably warm and respectful — he listens attentively, is always patient, and exudes a calm, comforting presence. What sets him apart is not just his gentleness but also his willingness to listen patiently, and share technical insights clearly and thoroughly, without ever making you feel rushed or overwhelmed. He’s the epitome of what a great doctor should be: compassionate, competent, and genuinely kind. A true gentleman.

Best doctor ever. Dr Leow is very warm, genuine and sincere. Always explain things to us patiently. He does not do unnecessary test or prescribe very strong medicine which has side effect. Both my parents see him and are extremely comfortable with him. He is like an old friend to them.

Also, kudos to the nurses who always provide excellent service and make every visit a pleasure. Thank you Dr Leow and team.

Dear Mount Elizabeth Novena Hospital Team,

I just wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care I received during my stay at Mount Elizabeth Novena Hospital. The doctors and nurses went above and beyond, showing not only their impressive skills but also their immense compassion.

The nurses were always patient and attentive, listening intently to my needs and offering comfort when I needed it most. The doctors exuded confidence in their abilities and, more importantly, displayed genuine kindness that made a world of difference in my recovery.

Thank you all for your hard work and dedication. You truly have big hearts, and I am so grateful to have been in your care.

Dear Dr Leow & Team,

Words could never express our gratitude for all you did and continue to do for our dad. You guys are truly amazing, compassionate & brilliant human beings! We admire you & your lovely team for your commitment to all of those patients and families who you helped every day!

Thank you so much! All the best!

Love always,
Marchia & Fam!

Went there after getting a referral for abnormal ECG results. Dr Leow was very patient in explaining the results amd suggesting next steps. I managed to do all the additional checks & procedures (echo, stress etc) and got it all sorted out and discharged on the same day. Really thankful for Dr Leow and team!
